name: Planning Report
query:
SELECT v.item_template as "Item:Link/Item:10", v.description as "Description:Data:150", v.technical_description as "Technical Description:Data:350", v.supplier as "Supplier:Data:200", v.material_request as "Material Request:Link/Material Request:120", v.order_date as "Order Data:Date:100", CASE WHEN v.days<30 THEN CONCAT("

",ROUND(v.days,1)) ELSE CONCAT("

",ROUND(v.days,1)) END as "Total Days:HTML:100", CASE WHEN (SELECT qty from `tabMaterial Request Item` where name=v.material_request_item)=(SELECT ordered_qty from `tabMaterial Request Item` where name=v.material_request_item) THEN "

Ordered

" WHEN (SELECT ordered_qty from `tabMaterial Request Item` where name=v.material_request_item)=0 THEN "

Pending

" ELSE "

Partially Ordered

" END AS "Status:HTML:100" FROM `tabShipment A` as v,`tabPurchase Planning` as pp WHERE pp.name=v.parent and v.docstatus!=2 and pp.project=%(project)s ORDER BY v.days DESC
